channel.title: Server helpp
channel.description:
I downloaded a source to learn how to code and it was alright, so I kept learning and got to a point where allstar was to easy. I then decided to code a new source, and as I compiled I got this error
[code]Compiling... .\server\src\client.java:1: error: illegal character: \187 ∩╗┐import java.io.BufferedReader; ^ .\server\src\client.java:1: error: illegal character: \191 ∩╗┐import java.io.BufferedReader; ^ 2 errors Compiling finished. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I don't know how to fix it. It says there is a error in line 1 of client.java, but what I see when I open it is a simple line, with no illegal character. How may I fix this?
